title: Nabassu
html:
Nabassu

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
& nabassu
Difficulty 17
Attacks Claw 2d4, Claw 2d4, Bite 3d4 drain life, Spell-casting
& nabassu
Difficulty 17
Attacks

Claw 2d4, Claw 2d4, Bite 3d4 drain life, Spell-casting

Base level 9
Base experience 327
Speed 15
Base AC -5
Base MR 50
Alignment -11 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Large
Resistances death magic, fire, poison, level drain
Resistances conveyed None

A nabassu:

  • can fly.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is a demon.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • requires a +1 weapon to hit.
  • hits creatures as a +3 weapon.
  • may turn against you when tame.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line4163

The nabassu is a monster added in SLASH'EM. It is a major demon that can cast monster spells and drain life through its melee attacks.

Strategy

While their somewhat low base level generally prevents them from using summon nasties, nabassus will frequently cast curse items against you. Combined with their relatively fast speed and tendency to haste themselves, this makes them a high-priority target. If engaging them in melee, one should be sure to have drain resistance or good magic cancellation to protect against their life-draining attack. Be aware that unlike many other spellcasters, their melee attacks will still do a respectable amount of damage, although it is by no means insurmountable.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Nabassu&oldid=162155"

The '''nabassu''' is a monster added in [[SLASH'EM]].  It is a [[major demon]] that can cast [[monster spell]]s and [[drain life]] through its melee attacks.

==Strategy==
While their somewhat low base level generally prevents them from using [[summon nasties]], nabassus will frequently cast [[curse items]] against you. Combined with their relatively fast speed and tendency to haste themselves, this makes them a high-priority target.  If engaging them in melee, one should be sure to have [[drain resistance]] or good [[magic cancellation]] to protect against their life-draining attack.  Be aware that unlike many other spellcasters, their melee attacks will still do a respectable amount of damage, although it is by no means insurmountable.
